data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Savannakhét, Laos so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Savannakhét, Laos
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Savannakhét, Laos into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Savannakhét, Laos to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Savannakhét do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kui people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Savannakhét to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Savannakhét.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Savannakhét, Laos has a population of 769,200.

We estimate Savannakhét has 19,551 people who might know Jesus, 9,476 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 740,173 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Savannakhét, Laos to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
